comment.body:
hello , thanks Alex i blocked the entire domain mediation.unity3d.com from the list as u suggested so far no ads shown hopefully this not temporarily fix so give me more time to confirm it's permanently worked in the meantime i like to share those new entries i found related to the ludo game , thanks for ur help
